headline: Emergency Connectivity Innovation Could Be a Game Changer for T-Mobile US (TMUS)
summary: In recent days, T-Mobile US announced significant advancements across emergency communications, with the first native three-way video emergency call in partnership with INdigital, and expanded satellite-based Text to 911 availability to all wireless users in remote U.S. areas. These developments not only extend critical connectivity nationwide but also highlight T-Mobile's efforts to innovate through interoperability, accessibility, and collaboration in both technology and customer...
